description:
Misaki must pick a Second, who will support her at the National Games. Everyone shows up to a party at Misaki`s house. Misaki`s mother is supposed to show up, but will she?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Anata ni Kimeta! Misaki no Eranda Hito
Du sollst an meiner Seite sein! Misakis Auserwählter
Eu Escolho Você! A Escolha De Misakichi!
I Choose You! Misaki`s Chosen Person
あなたに決めた! ミサキの選んだヒト
